ygData.subject: Re: Maven-Build errors

Well, it's not possible to disable the test goal - but its possible to
tell=
 maven-junit plugin to skip all the tests...

maven test -Dmaven.test.skip=
=3Dtrue

This executes the test goal and skips all the tests (sounds stupd =
-
but works just fine)...

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
